ctx: induction l as [| e es IH].
exceptions.exn: The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

ctx: induction l as [| e es IH].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

original: intros l H_sorted. induction l as [| e es IH]. -- simpl. apply NoDup_nil. -- simpl in *. destruct H_sorted as [H_head H_sorted_es]. apply NoDup_cons. ++ intro H_in. apply in_map_iff in H_in. destruct H_in as [e' [H_index_eq H_in]]. specialize (H_head e' H_in). destruct H_head as [H_index_gt _]. lia. ++ apply IH. apply H_sorted_es.
